name: Nerea Tulum
address: Fraccionamiento Tankah III Mza 3 Lote 21, 77760 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Situated in Tulum, a few steps from Tankah Bay Beach, Nerea Tulum features accommodation with free bikes, free private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a garden. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The hotel has a terrace and a hot tub. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. At Nerea Tulum the rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. A Full English/Irish, American or vegetarian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean, Seafood and Steakhouse cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. Activities such as snorkelling, canoeing, cycling can be enjoyed in the surroundings, and guests can relax along the beachfront. Soliman Bay Beach is 2.2 km from Nerea Tulum, while Tulum Archeological Site is 9.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cozumel International Airport, 70 km from the hotel.

name: Copal Tulum Hotel
address: Calle Ixchel sn, 77760 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Copal Tulum Hotel has pool views, free WiFi and free private parking, situated in Tulum, 4.7 km from Tulum Archeological Site. Fitted with a terrace, the units offer air conditioning and feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. Some units have a seating area and/or a balcony. An American breakfast is available each morning at the aparthotel. Copal Tulum Hotel offers 5-star accommodation with a spa facilities, wellness packages and beauty services. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at the accommodation, while pub crawls can be enjoyed nearby. Tulum Bus station is 1.9 km from Copal Tulum Hotel, while Bus station Tulum Ruins is 3.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cozumel International, 79 km from the aparthotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Irie Tulum Boutique Hotel
address: Av. Central, 77765 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 31 air-conditioned rooms featuring Smart televisions. Your pillowtop bed comes with down comforters and Egyptian cotton sheets. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming provides entertainment. Bathrooms feature showers with rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries. Amenities Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities, including an outdoor pool, a fitness center, and bicycles to rent. This Mediterranean aparthotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting (surcharge). The beach shuttle (surcharge) makes getting to the surf and sand a breeze. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. For a surcharge, guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle (available 24 hours) and a bus station shuttle. Property Location With a stay at Irie Tulum Boutique Hotel in Tulum, you'll be within a 15-minute drive of Tulum Mayan Ruins and Tulum National Park. This 4-star aparthotel is 3.7 mi (5.9 km) from Playa Paraiso and 4.3 mi (7 km) from Gran Cenote. Dining Enjoy a meal at Catharsis or snacks in the coffee shop/cafe. The aparthotel also offers room service (during limited hours). Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. Full breakfasts are available daily from 7:00 AM to 11:00 AM for a fee. Mandatory Charges You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: A tax is imposed by the city: USD 2.75 per accommodation, per night. This tax does not apply to children under 12 years of age. We have included all charges provided to us by the property. name: Motto by Hilton Tulum
address: Coba Avenue south sin nombre street, 77760 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Daily Mandatory Destination Charge will be added to the room rate and includes: $10 daily food and beverage credit for use in hotel bistro and rooftop bar beach club access to Bagattelle and Bagallum: daily parking for one vehicle bicycle rental, one per room.Located on the main avenue and entry to the hotel zone, were less than 10 minutes from the Turquoise Sea of the Mexican Caribbean and the Mayan Ruins. We are nearby recognized cenotes and protected natural reserves and water parks. Our modern hotel has sustainable practices and is noted as the best RoofTop in Tulum with two infinity pools, a stunning view of the jungle, and a relaxation area that turns around into an outdoor event area. Boost yourself with energy in its gym with certified instructors and different activities such as yoga in its outdoor venue, and closing, pamper yourself with a massage at the Spa. Try an exquisite, specialized wellness menu for guests who love to exercise and enjoy the fascinating world of mixology in one of our two bars. Motto Tulum is enclosed by the best commercial development with more than 20 stores and a gastronomic offer of 10 restaurants with unique menus.Hilton

name: Xela
address: Carretera Tulum-Boca Paila Km 8.7, 77766 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Set in Tulum, a few steps from South Tulum Beach, XELA offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. Featuring a bar, the 5-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation features room service and a 24-hour front desk for guests. Guests at the hotel can enjoy a continental breakfast. Tulum Archeological Site is 12 km from XELA, while Parque Nacional Tulum is 5.1 km away. The nearest airport is Cozumel International Airport, 86 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Shibari - Restaurant & Cenote Club
address: Carretera Tulum-punta Allen Km7, Boca Paila, 77766 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: No description found

name: Hotel Holistika Tulum
address: Av. 10 Sur Lote 4, Zona 11, Manzana 902, 77760 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Featuring an outdoor swimming pool and free WiFi, Hotel Holistika Tulum is situated in Tulum. The property is around 6 km from Tulum Archeological Site, 1.9 km from Tulum Bus station and 5 km from Bus station Tulum Ruins. Parque Nacional Tulum is 7 km from the hotel. The units at the hotel come with a seating area. Every room is equipped with air conditioning, and some units at Hotel Holistika Tulum have a terrace. Speaking English and Spanish at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always on hand to help. Cesiak is 14 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Cancún International Airport, 121 km from the property.

name: Alaya Tulum
address: Carretera Tulum Boca Paila Km 8.3, 77760 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Located in the beach-side of Tulum, Alaya Tulum by Ahau features an on-site restaurant. The property has a special terrace to practice yoga and a private beach area with sun beds for the guests to use. The rooms are air-conditioned and feature a terrace. The full bathroom has a shower and includes free toiletries. A sofa, iPod dock and a safe that fits a laptop are some of the amenities also available. At Alaya Tulum by Ahau you will find a garden, a terrace and a bar. Other facilities featured at the property include a tour desk. Free parking is offered on site. Tulum Archaeological Site can be reached in a 15-minute drive, while the Gran Cenote Site is 12 km away. Cancun can be reached in 1 hour and 30 minutes by car, while Playa del Carmen is 45 minutes’ drive away.

name: Mudra Tulum
address: Calle Asunción, La Veleta, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Featuring a year-round outdoor pool, Lumina at Mudra Tulum in Tulum provides accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking for guests who drive. Each unit comes with a sofa, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a well-fitted kitchen with a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also provided, as well as a coffee machine. The apartment offers a sun terrace. A bicycle rental service is available at Lumina at Mudra Tulum. Tulum Archeological Site is 5.3 km from the accommodation, while Tulum Bus station is 1.2 km away. The nearest airport is Cozumel International, 80 km from Lumina at Mudra Tulum, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Secrets Tulum Resort & Beach Club
address: Calle Itzimina Esq. Av Kukulkan,mz 001, Lote 007, Reg 014, Aldea Zama, Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: In a prime location in the centre of Tulum, Secrets Tulum Resort & Beach Club offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, free private parking and room service. Among the various facilities of this property are a fitness centre, a garden and a terrace. Guests can enjoy Mediterranean and Peruvian dishes at the restaurant or have a cocktail at the bar. Every room has a flat-screen TV, and certain units at the hotel have pool view. A buffet, continental or American breakfast is available every morning at the property. Speaking English and Spanish, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical information on the area at the reception. Tulum Archeological Site is 5.4 km from Secrets Tulum Resort & Beach Club, while Tulum Bus station is 2.8 km away. The nearest airport is Cozumel International, 80 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Siwa Tulum
address: Quintana Roo 15, 77762 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Located in Tulum, 5.4 km from Tulum Archeological Site, Siwa Tulum provides accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can make use of a bar. All units in the hotel are equipped with a kettle. At Siwa Tulum, every room is equipped with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. A continental breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. Tulum Bus station is 1.4 km from Siwa Tulum, while Bus station Tulum Ruins is 4.6 km away. The nearest airport is Cozumel International Airport, 80 km from the hotel.

name: Ana Y Jose Hotel & Spa Tulum
address: Carretera Tulum Boca Paila Km 7, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Set in tropical gardens, this hotel offers an outdoor pool, a spa and direct beach access. Each spacious, air-conditioned suite includes free Wi-Fi and views of the gardens or sea. Ana y Jose Charming Hotel & Spa is situated on Tulum Beach, a 5-minute drive from Tulum’s ancient Maya ruins. It is located on the edge of the Sian Ka’an Biosphere Reserve. The hotel’s stylish suites have typical Mexican décor. Each suite has a furnished terrace, a seating area, minibar and safety deposit box. Bathrooms include amenities and a hairdryer. The restaurant serves Mexican cuisine made with local produce, including freshly caught fish. Guests can also enjoy the sea views and sunsets from the terrace bar. Staff at the Ana y Jose’s 24-hour reception can organize a range of excursions and activites. These include visits to Mayan temples, trekking in the rainforest, diving courses or fishing trips.

name: Hotel Ma'xanab Tulum
address: Carretera Tulum-Boca Paila, Boca Paila Km6.5, 77760 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Situated in Tulum, a few steps from South Tulum Beach, Hotel Ma'xanab Tulum features accommodation with free bikes, free private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. With a garden, the 5-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation offers room service, a concierge service and organising tours for guests. At the hotel, every room includes a desk. The rooms include a coffee machine, while some rooms are fitted with a terrace and others also feature sea views. At Hotel Ma'xanab Tulum each room has bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes continental, American and vegetarian options. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Mexican cuisine. Vegetarian, vegan and gluten-free options can also be requested. Tulum Archeological Site is 10 km from Hotel Ma'xanab Tulum, while Parque Nacional Tulum is 3.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cozumel International, 84 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Bahia Principe Grand Tulum
address: Crta Chetumal - Cancun Km 250, 77760 Akumal, Quintana Roo
description: Featuring an outdoor pool, free WiFi access, and a spa, Bahia Principe Grand Tulum - All Inclusive is located in Akumal, Mexico. A flat-screen satellite TV, telephone, and alarm clock are included in each room. A minibar, refrigerator, and coffee machine are also furnished. Free toiletries and a hairdryer are provided in all private bathrooms. A tennis court and fitness centre are featured at the Bahia Principe Grand Tulum - All Inclusive as well as 9 bars and 4 restaurants. A waterpark, nightclub, and adjacent casino are also available for guests to enjoy. Aktun Chen Natural Park is 4.4 km from the hotel, Xcacel Beach is 9.7 km away, and Xel-Há Park is 11 minutes' drive away from the Bahia Principe Grand Tulum - All Inclusive.

name: The Beach Tulum
address: Road Tulum-Boca Paila km7, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: The adults-only The Beach Tulum Hotel offers a beautiful setting on Tulum Beach within 7 km of its famous Mayan Ruins. It features beach-front rooms with terraces and lounge area, an outdoor pool, beach club and a restaurant. Onsite Spa and onsite shop. Each luxurious, beach-front room has stylish, minimalist décor. Each air-conditioned accommodation includes free WiFi and a seating area. Guests can enjoy full breakfast either in the Ziggy's restaurant or Fresco's. Ziggy's Beach Club serves drinks and snacks from 09:00 until sunset. Tulum National Park is less than 4 km from the hotel, while the town centre is 10 minutes’ drive away. Cancún is within 140 km away and Playa del Carmen is within 60 km away.

name: Amaka Calma Riviera Tulum
address: Calle 9, Sur, Por 10 Sur Y 12 Sur, 77760 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 18 air-conditioned rooms featuring microwaves and flat-screen televisions. Digital television is provided for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and irons/ironing boards, and housekeeping is provided daily. Amenities Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities including an outdoor pool and a fitness center. Additional amenities at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and barbecue grills. The beach shuttle (surcharge) makes getting to the surf and sand a breeze. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, and a safe deposit box at the front desk. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite. This hotel is 4.1 mi (6.6 km) from Gran Cenote and 4.5 mi (7.2 km) from Playa Paraiso. Dining A complimentary full breakfast is served daily from 8:00 AM to 11:00 AM. name: Bahia Principe Luxury Akumal
address: Carretera Chetumal Benito Juarez KM 250, 77719 Akumal, Quintana Roo
description: This exclusive beach hotel is located amidst tropical vegetation and beside a kilometre-long untouched sandy beach of the Mayan Riviera with a protective coral reef. the center of Akumal is about 3.5 km away offering a range of shops and entertainment. The turist area of Tulum is about 15 km. Playa del Carmen is 35 km away. Cancún Airport is 60 min away. Both Xel-ha and Xcaret theme parks are 15 km or within around half an hour of the hotel. Car rental is available nearby.WebBeds

name: Bahia Principe Luxury Sian Ka'an - Adult Only Hotel
address: Km 250 Carr Federal a Chetumal, 77729 Akumal, Quintana Roo
description: Offering an outdoor pool and a restaurant, Bahia Principe Luxury Sian Ka´an - Adults Only - All Inclusive is located in the Riviera Maya town of Akumal. Free WiFi access is available in this resort. The accommodation will provide you with air conditioning and a balcony. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with a bath and a hairdryer. Extras include a seating area. At Bahia Principe Luxury Sian Ka´an - Adults Only - All Inclusive you will find a tennis court and a fitness centre Other facilities offered at the property include entertainment staff, a nightclub and luggage storage. An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including snorkelling. The property offers free parking. If you feel like visiting the surroundings, check out Xcacel-Xcacelito (5.5 km) and Kantenah Bay (23 km). This resort is 95 km from Cancún International Airport.

name: Bahia Principe Grand Coba
address: Carretera Chetumal - Cancun Km 250, Akumal, Quintana Roo
description: This exclusive beach hotel is located amidst tropical vegetation and besides a 1 km long untouched sandy beach of the Mayan Riviera with a protective coral reef. The center of Akumal is some 3.5 km away and offers a range of shops and numerous restaurants, bars, cafes, and other entertainment venues. The toursitic zone of Tulum is 15 km from the hotel. Playa del Carmen is 35 min away and Cancún Airport is 60 min away. Xel-ha and Xcaret theme parks are 15 - 30 min of the hotel. Car rental is available nearby.WebBeds

name: Xamira Tulum Luxury Condo
address: 7 poniente esquina con calle 16 sur, La Veleta, 77760 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a rainfall showerhead and a full-sized refrigerator/freezer, as well as free WiFi and a Smart TV. Other amenities include Egyptian cotton sheets, premium bedding, down comforters, and a freezer.Expedia

name: Casa Malca
address: Carretera Tulum-Boca Paila Km 9.5, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Special check-in instructions Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival. Know Before You Go Reservations are required for massage services and spa treatments. Reservations can be made by contacting the hotel prior to arrival, using the contact information on the booking confirmation. Only registered guests are allowed in the guestrooms. No pets and no service animals are allowed at this property. This property advises that enhanced cleaning and guest safety measures are currently in place. Disinfectant is used to clean the property; commonly-touched surfaces are cleaned with disinfectant between stays; bed sheets and towels are laundered at a temperature of at least 60°C/140°F. Personal protective equipment, including masks and gloves, will be available to guests. Social distancing measures are in place; staff at the property wear personal protective equipment; periodic temperature checks are conducted on staff; temperature checks are available to guests; guests are provided with hand sanitizer. Contactless check-in and contactless check-out are available. Individually-wrapped food options are available through room service. Each guestroom is kept vacant for a minimum of 48 hours between bookings. This property affirms that it adheres to the cleaning and disinfection practices of Safe Travels (WTTC - Global). name: Ahau Tulum
address: Carr. Tulum a Boca Paila Km. 7.5, 77760 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Ahau Tulum is an eco-friendly and pet-friendly property that offers free Wi-Fi connection, yoga lessons and massage services for a fee. It features solar and wind panels for heating and a rain catch system to recycle the water. The suites have mosquito nets and fans, plus views of the Caribbean Sea are available. Bathrobes and iPod dockings are some of the amenities they offer, along with furnished terraces. The bathroom has a shower. The restaurant at Ahau Tulum serves international cuisine. Tulum’s beach is just a few metres from the property, which also has a shared lounge area, laundry and ironing services. Tulum Archaeological Site can be reached in a 10-minute drive, and Tulum is 8.9 km away.

name: Hotel Cabañas Tulum Beach Hotel & Spa
address: Carretera Cancun-Tulum Bocapalia Km 7, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: This hotel is located on one of the nicest beaches in Tulum, Mexico. The hotel offers a secluded location, guest rooms with free WiFi, an on-site restaurant and the Ziggy's Beach Club. Rooms at Cabanas Tulum include hammocks on the private terrace. Some rooms are located directly on the beach. Some rooms feature a private rooftop terrace with hot tub. Fresco's offers international cuisine and has children menu. Hotel guests can enjoy the beach club amenities, as well as cocktails and beers. The bilingual staff at Cabanas Tulum can arrange tours to nearby eco-friendly attractions like Sian Ka'an, a natural biosphere, or tours to sightseeing the cenotes, the natural underground pools, or travel to the archaeological sites nearby including Cobá, Chichen Itza and Ek Balam. Cabanas Tulum has Naj Naay Spa. Our guests minimum age is 14 years.

name: Akumal Bay Beach & Wellness Resort
address: Km 104 Carr. Cancun-Chetumal, 77760 Akumal, Quintana Roo
description: Located on Akumal Bay, this 4-star beach resort is only a 20-minute drive to Tulum. This resort features 2 beach-side pools and 3 restaurants serving international cuisine. Every room at the Akumal Bay Beach & Wellness Resort offers a full ocean view and a private balcony or terrace. The air conditioned rooms offer color TV and an in-room safety deposit box. On-site activities at the Akumal Bay Beach & Wellness Resort include fitness classes, beach volleyball and snorkelling. A Kid’s Club provides supervised fun activities for children. Guests can enjoy drinks and snacks at the Pool Bar. Downtown Akumal is within walking distance of the resort and Cancun is within an hours’ drive.

name: Luxury Condos Macondo Tulum
address: Calle Juanek lote 1 manzana 25 Aldea Maya, 77760 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a rainfall showerhead and a full-sized refrigerator/freezer, as well as free WiFi and a TV. Other amenities include towels, table tennis, kitchenware and utensils, and a wardrobe or closet.Expedia

name: Lula Tulum
address: Km 8.2 Carretera Boca Paila, 77790 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Designed to accommodate, Sanar was created with options for intimate relaxation or social interactions with like minded individuals. In 2017 Sanara Tulum was selected #3 in the 150 Greatest Hotels in the world by Harpers Bazaar. The hotel also won the 2015 National Competition in the category of Architecture and Interiors for Hotels from the Asociacion de Arquitectos e Interioristas, Mexico. A space that harmonizes with the beauty of its surroundings. The sleek and simple architecture is nestled in-between wildly sprouting Coconut Palms and Mayan Cheet trees while the ocean provides ample breeze and the serenading sounds of crashing waves.Lula 19 AC rooms, suites and villas, Wellness Center, and Studio are built on the coveted white sand beaches of Tulum, Mexic. Overlooking the crystal clear turquoise sea, the curative boutique hotel offers both Beachside & Sanara Jungle Poolside rooms. Each Lula beach room offers a private balcony, luxurious bathroom, and wardrobe. Dressed with imported bamboo cotton from Italy, both the super king size and additional day bed make for the ultimate luxury in sleeping, and accommodate up to two or three people.The stunningly appointed Sanara Villa, situated in our beachside garden, has one opulent master suite downstairs with a large living room, and upstairs an additional 2 bedroom suite. The Villa can sleep up to 8 adults. +Our Jungle provides 4 gorgeous jungle rooms nestled around a private pool and waterfall, each with a King bed, air conditioning and private bathroom. In addition we offer a Jungle Villa with 2 Suites, each comprising of 1 spacious bedroom and 1 living room. Our Jungle villa also has a stunning Jungle roof terrace which delivers stunning sunsets over the canopy of trees. Sanara Jungle is very popular with groups and more economic travelers who wish to come and enjoy Sanara's stunning yoga facility, the acclaimed cuisine inside The Real Coconut, and of course the priceless Tulum beach. Our restaurant has become a global hit with people traveling just to eat with us. Created by Daniella Hunter, The Real Coconut's philosophy of eating is a regimen for sustainable living, both personally and for the planet. Built on the foundational belief that plants form the key to our vitality and that gut health and digestion are paramount to optimum well being, The Real Coconut is dedicated to all that is conscious living. Daniella integrates key elements of paleo, gluten & grain-free, and vegan diet practices, ultimately creating a menu that is universal without compromising taste. The Real coconut products are now sold in Whole Foods Markets, Costco and thousands of stores stores across the United States, Canada and EnglandThe menus are gluten free; grain free, dairy free; refined sugar free; soy free; and cashew freeIn a coconut shell.our philosophy is plant based food with options to include sustainably sourced animal proteins.The hotel also features one of the most stunning yoga studios on the planet, where Tulum's finest teachers provide three classes a day. And finally you can encounter "care" and "service" in the Sanara Wellness Center, which has also been consistently listed in top wellness lists in thew world, offering a comprehensive menu to help you take away any stress and support your total rejuvenation.iHotelier/iStay

name: Bunah Tulum -Distinctive Hotels-

address: Region 15, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: When you stay at Little Gem Hotel Tulum La Veleta in Tulum, you'll be in the entertainment district, within a 10-minute drive of Tulum Beach and Tulum National Park. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, luggage storage, and coffee/tea in a common area. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Roc Jungle Tulum
address: Carretera Tulum-Boca Paila Km 5.5, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: With a stay at Roc Jungle Tulum in Tulum, you'll be steps from Tulum Beach and a 2-minute drive from Sian Ka'an Biosphere Reserve. Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, and laundry facilities. Guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle for a surcharge, and free self parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Mereva Tulum
address: Frac. Tankah III No. Mza 3 Lote 35, 77760 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Offering Two outdoor pools and gourmet food, Mereva Tulum by Blue Sky is located 10 minutes' drive from Tulum town and 15 minutes’ drive from the Tulum Mayan Ruins. It has a private dock and offers kayaking and snorkelling, complimentary paddle board. The air-conditioned rooms feature free WiFi, an HDTV with satellite channels and a balcony with sea views. All with private bathrooms, most of them count with double rain shower, twin sinks and mirrors. A la carte American breakfast is included. At Mereva Tulum by Blue Sky you can enjoy romantic dinners or spa treatments with wonderful Caribbean Sea views on the 45-metre dock. The Manati Cenote is located right across from Mereva Tulum by Blue Sky. This Boutique Hotel is 10 minutes’ drive from Xel-Há Eco-Theme Park and 90-minutes’ drive from Cancún International Airport. Free parking is available on site.

name: Los Amigos Tulum
address: Calle 14 Sur, Lote 16, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 15 guestrooms, featuring kitchenettes with full-sized refrigerators/freezers and stovetops. Rooms have private balconies or patios. Flat-screen televisions with cable programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include safes and coffee/tea makers, and housekeeping is provided daily. Amenities Relax and unwind with massages, body treatments, and facials. If you're looking for recreational opportunities, you'll find an outdoor pool, a sauna, and a fitness center. Additional features at this aparthotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a picnic area. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, multilingual staff, and luggage storage. Planning an event in Tulum? This aparthotel has facilities measuring 500 square feet (46 square meters), including conference space. At the hotel, the rooms are fitted with a wardrobe. Rooms are fitted with a coffee machine, while certain rooms come with a kitchen with a microwave and a minibar. At MILAM each room has bed linen and towels. A continental, Full English/Irish or Italian breakfast is available each morning at the property. You can play billiards at this 5-star hotel, and the area is popular for hiking and cycling. The accommodation features amenities such as an on-site business centre and hot tub. Tulum Bus station is 1.7 km from Kimpton - Aluna Tulum, while Parque Nacional Tulum is 2 km from the property. Cozumel International Airport is 65 km away.

There is also a kitchen in some of the units equipped with a microwave. The aparthotel offers 4-star accommodation with a wellness packages, fitness room and public bath. description: With a stay at Playa Las Palmas Glamping Tulum in Tulum, you'll be steps from Playa Paraiso and a 4-minute drive from Tulum National Park. Featured amenities include express check-out and luggage storage. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Conrad Tulum Riviera Maya
address: Carretera Cancun Tulum 307, 77774 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Experience the magic of Tulum with views of the ocean from every room and suite, approximately a 2-hour drive from Cancun International Airport. Uncover your sense of wonder in our resort with five pools, 11 restaurants, and magnificent views. Our personalized concierge can help you unwind or fill your day with beach activities, spa treatments, and excursions to nearby attractions. Tulum is a Magical Town with an eco-chic atmosphere that provides a spiritual and relaxing sensation. Tulum city center, underwater caves, amusement parks, and more are all within 30 minutes. The ultimate place for an unplugged beach vacation, explore historic ruins and the Sian Ka’an Biosphere Reserve, as well as shops and restaurants. Enjoy beautiful white-sand beaches, lagoons, cenotes, and caverns that show the beauty of nature in all its splendor.Hilton

name: Grand Sirenis Riviera Maya Resort & Spa
address: Carretera Federal Cancún - Tulúm, Zona Costera, Km 256.3, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Overlooking the Caribbean Sea, Grand Sirenis Riviera Maya Resort & Spa is a modern hotel featuring 3 outdoor pools, a spa and a private beach area. It offers spacious, air-conditioned rooms. The hotel’s stylish rooms offer spectacular garden and sea views and feature a separate seating area equipped with a flat-screen TV. The bathroom features a whirlpool tub and includes a bathrobe and slippers. Grand Riviera Maya offers a variety of dining options, including Mexican, Italian, Mediterranean, Brazilian, Thai, Japanese and French cuisine. There is also a poolside bar, coffee shop, several bars and an on-site souvenir shop. The property offers a dolphinarium with extra cost. Guests can relax in the gardens or enjoy a number of water sports including snorkelling, and kayaking. The Mexican-themed eco-archaeological park, Xcaret Park, is 26 km away. Playa del Carmen is 30 km away. There is an ATM machine at the resort and on-site parking is available.

name: Biwa Tulum
address: Av. Satelite Norte y calle Bubullek, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Well located in the centre of Tulum, Biwa Tulum provides air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, free private parking and room service. This 4-star hotel offers a shared lounge and a concierge service. The hotel has a fitness centre, year-round outdoor pool and terrace, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant. At the hotel, each room has a city view, room desk, flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, and towels. Rooms come with a coffee machine, while selected rooms come with has a balcony with chairs a kitchen with a fridge, a minibar and a stovetop. Guest rooms include a safety deposit box. You can play billiards at this 4-star hotel, and bike hire and car hire are available. Tulum Archeological Site is 3.7 km from Biwa Tulum, while Tulum Bus station is 1 km away. The nearest airport is Cozumel International, 78 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Dreams Tulum Resort & Spa
address: Carretera Chetumal-Puerto Juarez KM 236.7 No.1, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Among acres of tropical gardens and jungle, Dreams Tulum Resort & Spa is located just minutes' from the ancient Mayan ruins and the trendy and bohemian town of Tulum. Dreams Tulum is a AAA Four Diamond award-winning resort, with all the benefits of Unlimited-Luxury® - where everything is included. Dreams Tulum’s magnificent Mexican colonial architecture blends tastefully with an up scale contemporary design where every room offers a private and furnished terrace or balcony, marble bathroom, daily refreshed mini-bar and 24-hour room service. Dreams Tulum also offers a secluded adults-only section and swim out suites for direct access to a pool. Additionally, there is a splash park for kids located near the Explorer’s Club. The pools are heated from December and March depending on climate conditions. Dreams Tulum sits on 2 miles of powdery white sand with activities to make the whole family happy including on-site watersports and dive shop, discounted greens fees at the nearby Riviera Maya Golf Club, an Explorer’s Club for Kids and a Core Zone Teens Club. The Dreams Spa by Pevonia® offers serene jungle and beach cabins, a spa pantry for guests to create their own spa products and a Temazcal for a traditional Mayan spa ceremony experience. With authentic and gourmet dining options, unlimited top-shelf spirits and nightly entertainment, guests can enjoy a Dream vacation at Dreams Tulum Resort & Spa.

The hotel has an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, evening entertainment and a shared lounge. With a private bathroom, some units at the hotel also feature a city view. Gardenia Collective offers an à la carte or American breakfast. Tulum Archeological Site is 3.1 km from the accommodation, while Tulum Bus station is 1.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cozumel International, 77 km from Gardenia Collective, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at the accommodation. Tulum Archeological Site is 6 km from Casa Lam, while Tulum Bus station is 2.1 km away. The nearest airport is Cozumel International Airport, 67 km from the villa.

A minibar and kitchenware are also provided, as well as a coffee machine. The aparthotel offers a picnic area. address: Carr Tulum Boca Paila Km 3.85, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Ideally located in the prime touristic area of Tulum, Kore Tulum Retreat Wellness Resort promises a relaxing and wonderful visit. Offering a variety of facilities and services, the hotel provides all you need for a good night's sleep. 24-hour room service, 24-hour security, daily housekeeping, 24-hour front desk, luggage storage are just some of the facilities on offer. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. Enjoy the hotel's recreational facilities, including yoga room, fitness center, spa, solarium, billiards, before retiring to your room for a well-deserved rest. No matter what your reasons are for visiting Tulum, Kore Tulum Retreat Wellness Resort will make you feel instantly at home.priceline.com

description: Set in Tulum, a few steps from Tankah Bay Beach, Alea Tulum offers accommodation with free bikes, free private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. Each accommodation at the 4-star hotel has sea views, and guests can enjoy access to a garden and to a shared lounge. Offering free WiFi throughout the property, the non-smoking hotel has a hot tub and evening entertainment. All guest rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. The rooms come with a coffee machine, while selected rooms also feature a terrace and others also feature pool views. At Alea Tulum rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available every morning, and includes à la carte, Full English/Irish and American options. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Mexican and local cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. Activities such as snorkelling, canoeing, cycling can be enjoyed in the surroundings, and guests can relax along the beachfront. Speaking English and Spanish, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical information on the area at the 24-hour front desk. Soliman Bay Beach is 2 km from Alea Tulum, while Tulum Archeological Site is 10 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cozumel International Airport, 70 km from the hotel.

All rooms in the resort are fitted with a coffee machine. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, guest rooms at The Waves Tulum have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms are equipped with a terrace. The resort offers a range of wellness facilities including a sauna and a hot tub. Bus station Tulum Ruins is 4.3 km from The Waves Tulum, while Parque Nacional Tulum is 5.2 km away. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. name: Secrets Akumal Riviera Maya Resort Adults Only
address: Carretera Federal 307, Km 254 600, 77760 Akumal, Quintana Roo
description: Featuring an outdoor pool, restaurant and spa, Secrets Akumal Riviera Maya is located in Riviera Maya. This adult-only hotel offers a fitness centre, beauty shop, nightclub and evening entertainment. Free WiFi access is available. Each room at the hotel provides a hot tub, a flat-screen cable TV and a minibar. Featuring a spa bath and shower, private bathrooms come complete with a hairdryer and free toiletries. A sofa, a desk and an outdoor seating area are also featured in every room. A 24-hour front desk welcomes guests to Secrets Akumal Riviera Maya, and it offers a private beach area, a sauna and a terrace. Guests will also e able to enjoy of the tennis court and the bicycles on loan. Other facilities offered at the property include a games room. An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including snorkelling. The property offers free parking. Playa del Carmen is a 30-minute drive away. Cancun is a 60-minute drive away.

name: Aloft Tulum
address: Av. Coba Sur Mz 5 Lt 1, Smz 1 Region 14, Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Modern spaces and open expression prevail at Aloft Tulum. Our hotel in Tulum, Mexico, offers a wide selection of cutting-edge technology, high-touch amenities, and a perfect location near the city center. We're also just a short drive from stunning Caribbean beaches. Immerse yourself in the local way of life while enjoying the vibrant attractions Tulum has to offer, including the archaeological area, majestic cenotes, pristine beaches, natural reserves and more. Explore a variety of well-regarded restaurants in the area, or stop by W XYZ Restaurant here at the hotel to savor simple dishes with unique twists. Mix, mingle and soak up the jungle views from our rooftop lounge, offering great music and vibes, dining and a variety of cocktails. As the evening draws to a close, you'll find a welcome reprieve from the excitement in our stylish hotel rooms and suites in Tulum, which provide eye-catching designs and perks like complimentary Wi-Fi. Your Mexico adventure awaits at Aloft Tulum Hotel.Marriott

name: Kimpton Aluna Tulum
address: Poligono 04 Fraccion 05 Lote 04, 77760 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Enjoy an oasis of beauty and tranquility away from the party and chaos between the jungle and the sea; we have exclusive beach clubs, get to where you want in minutes on one of our bikes available for guests. Our luxury 4 star boutique hotel combines modernity with spirituality, restore mental, physical and emotional balance with our yoga classes at no additional cost. Relax in our pool surrounded by lush vegetation or enjoy breathtaking views from our rooftop pool, perfect for enjoying the sunset. Be pampered during our social hour with drinks and snacks. Or live local experiences, such as tortilla classes and tours of the village.IHG Hotels & Resorts

Rooms at TagoTulum include a minibar and TV with satellite channels. Coffee-making facilities are provided and a private bathroom features a double shower, hairdryer, and free toiletries. Rooms boast garden or sea views with a private pool. A garden and 24-hour front desk service are available for guests' use. Other facilities offered at the property include a tour desk and luggage storage. Free parking is available. Our hotel boutique is 6 km from Tulum Archeological Site, 3.9 km from Parque Nacional Tulum, and 8.8 km from Cesiak.
